channel.title: SourceForge.net: SF.net Project News: TinyXPath : a tiny C++ XPath processor (including full news text)
channel.description: SF.net Project News: TinyXPath : a tiny C++ XPath processor (tinyxpath project) - Small footprint C++ library to extract an XPath expression from an XML tree. Uses the TinyXML project to parse XML trees and store intermediate results. Runs on any platform. Optional use of STL. Overhead less than 100KB, including TinyXML.
channel.copyright: Copyright and acceptable usage information for this RSS may feed may be found at: http://sourceforge.net/docman/display_doc.php?docid=6048&group_id=1#licensing_and_other_terms

item.title: TinyXPath 1.2.1 is released
item.description:
TinyXPath has release the 1.2.1 version.
It's a maintenance release, with one bug fix.
The API has been improved with some easier-to-use static functions. (0 comments)
item.author: yvesb@users.sourceforge.net (Yves Berquin)

item.title: TinyXPath 1.2 is released
item.description: Maintenance release with some bug fixing (0 comments)
item.author: yvesb@users.sourceforge.net (Yves Berquin)

item.title: Version 1.1 is out
item.description: This is a fully working version of TinyXPath. All regression tests are working. (0 comments)
item.author: yvesb@users.sourceforge.net (Yves Berquin)

item.title: Release 0.3 is out
item.description:
(Windows only - Linux to follow)
A big chunck of XPath is working now.
Still need some functions, but we are close (0 comments)
item.author: yvesb@users.sourceforge.net (Yves Berquin)

item.title: Release 0.2 is out
item.description: A lot more syntax is now applied to the XML tree. See http://tinyxpath.sourceforge.net for a list of expressions correctly handled and http://tinyxpath.sourceforge.net/res.html for the current output. (0 comments)
item.author: yvesb@users.sourceforge.net (Yves Berquin)

item.title: First release 0.1 is out
item.description: Basic functionnality. Syntax is completed parsed. Some expressions correctly solved already (0 comments)
item.author: yvesb@users.sourceforge.net (Yves Berquin)

item.title: Syntax decoding is done
item.description:
The step1 (syntax decoding) seems to be flying.
Now attacking the application to an XML tree, using the TinyXML module (0 comments)
item.author: yvesb@users.sourceforge.net (Yves Berquin)
